name: The I.R.I.S Project
description:
Some things to note:
This is not a dating sim you cant choose separate paths or anything like that.
This game is not NSFW but it does feature some scandalous premarital hand holding .

This is my first (and possibly only) visual novel I really had no clue what I was doing but I'm fairly happy with it.

I made this little visual novel as a fun project but also to share a tiny bit of the story I have of my OCs because why not. If you are from my Instagram Hi Hello you already know whats going on here, if you are not from Instagram you should totally follow if you like the game because I plan to do more to further grow the story.
